Articles.Content:
The Kerbal Institution of Aerospace Aeronautics (KIAA) will cease operations till more funding comes in. The mission director has announced that there is a possibility of periodic flights every now and then, with a possibility of normal operations continuing in August this year. Nearby residents are advised to stay clear of Kerbal Space Centre due to irresponsible kerbonauts strapping seats to rockets. The KSC observatory will function as normal, however the museum will be closed to the public till further notice as we deal with stolen boosters and debris falling from the skies. Please stay at least 50 kilometers away from the KSC's perimeter to prevent civilian casualties. Thank you for your support.

-Malnu Kerman,

Public Relations/Mission Director

...Okay? Have you been lurking around for a while or...what?

This is your first post...I...wha?
Well, why are you taking a leave of absence for? Manage your time right and i'm sure you could get one flight a day or so.

Well, why are you taking a leave of absence for? Manage your time right and i'm sure you could get one flight a day or so.

Time management? I think you have the wrong game.

Just play 'till ya can't play no more! Y'all get it eventually!
